Plot: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.
Title: In the Bedroom
Writer: Robert Festinger (screenplay), Todd Field (screenplay), Andre Dubus (story "Killings")
Actors: Tom Wilkinson, Sissy Spacek, Nick Stahl, Marisa Tomei
tomatoConsensus: Expertly crafted and performed, In the Bedroom is a quietly wrenching portrayal of grief.
Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 38 wins & 69 nominations.
